booking_slots.description: Array of available booking time slots in ISO format

business_uid.description: Unique identifier for a business account

description: A BusinessBookingSlots entity represents the available booking time slots for a business. It includes an array of available time slots in ISO 8601 format and a unique identifier for the business account.

x-vcita-access.note: Only Directory tokens can access this entity. Staff and other tokens receive 403 Forbidden.
